thread.title: Flint Activist, Mother of Four, Among Winners of Environmental Prize

author: Jim Carlton
title: Flint Activist, Mother of Four, Among Winners of Environmental Prize
text:
SAN FRANCISCO—A mother of four who helped draw national attention to the drinking-water crisis in Flint, Mich., is among this year’s recipients of the Goldman Environmental Prize, the green world’s equivalent of an Oscar.
The mother, LeeAnne Walters, is one of seven activists from six countries being honored at a ceremony here Monday by the Goldman Environmental Foundation, which was started by the late San Francisco philanthropists Richard and Rhoda Goldman to honor grass-roots environmental activists around the world.
